title: Outgoing Server Settings failed
creator: mgs5
content: I am attempting to set up TB10.1 on Android 15. The above response is followed by: Network error - Connection reset. I have been using TB on Win11 and applied the same settings. mailx.freeparking.co.nz Port 465 SSL/TLS Encrypted Pw "my sign in name". The incoming server settings seem to be OK. Thanks mgs
